author: Elastic
rule.description:
Identifies when a user is added as an owner for an Azure application. An adversary may add a user account as an owner
for an Azure application in order to grant additional permissions and modify the application's configuration using
another account.
rule.name: User Added as Owner for Azure Application
rule.note:
## Setup

The Azure Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
rule.query: event.dataset:azure.auditlogs and azure.auditlogs.operation_name:"Add owner to application" and event.outcome:(Success or success)
